author: Walter Fogg
comment: After having to register an account it never recognize s the credentials even after multiple reset attempts. Useless.

author: Jesse Oglesby
comment: This app is flawless. Best thing available for business travel.
title: Loaded with great features.

author: Robert Frayvolt
comment: But track flight changes a little better with times instead of saying just a delay.
title: Good

author: Phillip Rudolph
comment: Great for reviewing travel itineraries. All the important information in one place.
title: Trip at a glance

author: Bethany Olsen
comment: Love that I have reservation information at my fingertips.
title: Great Resource

author: Edwin Medina
comment: Love how it keeps me informed with changes in the schedule....
title: Great app for travel

author: Felipe Rojas
comment: Practical and easy to use

author: Steven Brevett
comment: Great app

author: Gary Ford
comment: Have an account through work. Can't log in with that info in the app, making it useless for me.
title: Can't log in

author: Carlos Vasquez
comment: It does what is supposed to. I originally had trouble loggin in. If you are having trouble logging in, call Travel Port customer service to reset your user ID or password. This resolved my logging in issue.

author: Chad Dean
comment: I down loaded update now can not open the program liked old version

reply.author: Travel and Transport
reply.content: Sorry for any issues you have encountered.  We were having server issues.  They should be resolved.  Please let us know if you still are having issues by contacting us at Dash@TravelAndTransport.com

title: The update

author: Antonio José Jaramillo Ossaba
comment: I can't login after the last update. Please fix it...using Nexus 6P android marshmallow.

reply.author: Travel and Transport
reply.content: Sorry for any issues you have encountered.  We were having server issues.  They should be resolved.  Please let us know if you still are having issues by contacting us at Dash@TravelAndTransport.com

title: Can't login

author: Patti Cavlovic
comment: Love this app

reply.author: Travel and Transport
reply.content: Thanks for your review. Contact us for any future feedback at Dash@TravelAndTransport.com.

author: Derick Rainey
comment: Perhaps a mobile app should scale correctly for a mobile device. Trying to use this app to check in for a flight is awful.

reply.author: Travel and Transport
reply.content: Our app uses the airlines mobile websites for check in.  Our latest release 2.6.0 includes tons of webview updates.  Hopefully they make the experience better.   Contact us for any future feedback at Dash@TravelAndTransport.com..

title: View

author: Paul Peterson
comment: I'd like to choose which phone calendar to sync my reservations with.  When it syncs to my local phone calendar instead of my outlook calendar it's more steps for me so I rarely use the app.

reply.author: Travel and Transport
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback about adding the ability to change from the default calendar.   We have added this feedback for consideration for future updates.  Contact us for any future feedback at Dash@TravelAndTransport.com..

title: Default calendar please

author: Reece Caldwell
comment: Rental car addresses in the app. We get to jump straight to navigating to our hotels, can you add that to rental car locations. Not all airports advertise how to get there well, and we don't always use the airport rental return.

reply.author: Travel and Transport
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback about adding a map location to the rental cars.   We have added this feedback for consideration for future updates.  Contact us for any future feedback at Dash@TravelAndTransport.com..

title: Suggestion

author: Dan Eberle
comment: Much better than having paper and email itineraries, good accompaniment to electronic  boarding passes...everything on my phone.

reply.author: Travel and Transport
reply.content: Thanks for your review.  Contact us for any future feedback at Dash@TravelAndTransport.com..

title: Travel made easy.

author: Robyn Higgins
comment: Very handy

author: Tim Arnold
comment: Everything I need in one place and I no longer have to forward my trip to get them in the app like other apps require.
title: Awesome!!

author: Cherie Mason
comment: Love having everything in one place.
title: Great app.

author: A Google User
comment: Has everything a T&T client needs to manage their reservations.  Love that you can direct dial your reservations team if needed.  I use the free version and it has worked without bugs.
title: Great App

author: A Google User
comment: Finally an app that has everything I need for business travel.
title: Great app

author: A Google User
comment: You cannot use the keyboard on droidx20 with some of the options
title: Texts

author: Ed Trotter
comment: Need to provide info on setup based on existing account info.  Useless without it.
title: Bad setup

author: Mark Dauner
comment: Easy to use, simple, great tool.
title: Great App!
